unit_rules.name: Illuminor
unit_rules.text: While this model is within 3" of a friendly +Necrons+ unit, this model has the +Lone Operative+ ability.

unit_rules.name: Mechanical Augmentation
unit_rules.text: Friendly +Necrons Battleline+ units within 6" have the Armor Break of their attacks improved by 1. Attacks made against them have their Armor Break worsened by 1 (no worse than 0).

unit_rules.name: Atomic Energy Manipulator
unit_rules.text: After Activation, if this model destroyed one or more enemy models with a melee attack, add 3" to the range of its Mechanical Augmentation ability, until the end of the battle.
